Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class MazeRunnerGame

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.Game
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.MazeRunnerGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
public class MazeRunnerGame extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
Main game class that serves as the central hub for Maze Runner. Extends LibGDX's Game class to manage screens and shared resources.

Responsibilities: - Loading and managing all game assets (textures, animations, sounds, music) - Switching between different screens (menu, gameplay, options, etc.) - Managing story mode progression (current level, save slots) - Providing shared resources to all screens (SpriteBatch, Skin, animations) - Handling background music for different levels - Storing player preferences

This class uses the Singleton pattern through LibGDX's Game class - there's only one instance that all screens reference for assets and navigation.

      Parameters:
      fileChooser - native file chooser (unused but required by launcher)

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Cleans up all resources when the game is closed. Disposes of textures, music, and other assets to prevent memory leaks.
      Specified by:
      dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
      Overrides:
      dispose in class com.badlogic.gdx.Game
